summary: This is a collection of 5 different followers, with five different specialties, and located at five different places.
descriptionHtml:
Rogue Khajiit Collection  - 5 Different Followers -

This is a collection of 5 different followers that I have created.
Each follower comes with five different specialties that affect how they will interact with you and how they will fight alongside you.
Each of the followers are located at a different place in the game. They are all in a hold, besides one.
The list below helps you understand a little bit about each follower.


Rogue Khajiit Collection Followers:

Name - Outfit Style   - Hold/Main Location - Specific Building      - Weapon Style
Strogan - Jester        - Whiterun               - The Bannered Mare - Dual Weap.
Brox - Daedric          - Winterhold             - Jarls Longhouse       - Dual Weap.
Froge - Fancy           - Riften                    - Bee & Barb             - Single Weap.
Elijah - Dwarven        - Dawnstar                - Windpeak Inn          - Single Weap.
Rogamin - Greybeard - Mountains              - High Hrothgar          - Magic
author: satelliting
